attributes.review: When I downloaded this app, I expected it to tell me how to get Trump out of office. Instead it asked me for my mobile phone number when I opened it. Not what I signed up for!
attributes.title: Not what I expected

attributes.review:
This app is bad,  very, very, VERY😡 bad🤪

What🤷🏾‍♀️the😬FUUuuuk🗑who🤔in👈🏽the📉hell🔥put😏the🎱muffins🥖in⛺️the🎤freEzA❄️
attributes.title: No🧡

attributes.review: This by far is THE worst app i’ve ever downloaded in my existence. I simply wanted to download this app and see what it was about and to see what trump is up to. first of all off the bat it took 7 WHOLE DAYS AND 6 WHOLE NIGHTS TO DOWNLOAD, *i have very very fast wifi*. second of all, it asks me for my personal information like my phone number just so i can log in (without it i cannot) I FEEL MY LIFE AND INFORMATION AND ALL MY PRIVACY IS AT RISK SINCE it requires a phone number plus it says that with my phone number i’ll get messages and updates which I DO NOT WANT. next up, the format of the app is very very very confusing and frustrating, after 7 days of waiting for all of these problems and inconvenienses, i wanted to BASH MY PHONE on the ground and slam it with a sledge hammer until it no longer worked, this app is absolute rubbish and should be completely taken off the app store and banned worldwide. most people i have talked to about this app also do not like it because it requires your phone number, they did not like the fact that it did so due to privacy issues and any information of theirs being leaked, this app is dangerous and if any child downloads it from curiosity and inputs their phone number, i am afraid THE CHILDS LIFE WILL BE AT STAKE. i’m staying only what i know as a fact from downloading this app and from speaking with others that have done so too, this is NOT FAKE NEWS believe me when i say this app is rubbish, EVERYONE NEEEDS TO GIVE THIS A ONE STAR REVIEW
attributes.title: Worst app i’ve ever downloaded such a waste of 7 days of downloading

attributes.review: Spreading propaganda to take away people’s rights based off things they can’t control! It also ate my cat:
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I added my age into the header to show I am not a gen z trying to get trumps app take down. I downloaded the app and was genuinely disappointed with the content, I was hoping to get insight into what Trump truly stand for and all I got was bulls***. He’s a horrible person.
attributes.title: I’m 37

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app thinking it was something good but no it turned out wanting to ask personal stuff and I got offended because I do not give away that stuff.

attributes.review: this is the worst app ever 🌚when I got there I saw something so unsettling 🤢I DO NOT recommend this app 👻 I had the worst time understanding this app like everything that it said 🤢 no 🤢 it was disturbing🤮 I was ✨disgusted✨ i am never downloading again it took so long to download NOT worth my time had a whole party palooza before this app downloaded. I can’t explain the horror I felt when I downloaded this app 🐷 no please to help yourself do NOT download this 🙉🐛 no🌞 no. not doing that ever again 👹 no. not again.         ✨ no.✨

attributes.review: This app put an EVIL curse on me and my family!!!! We are a god loving house hold!!! I opened the app and it was a black screen and devil worshiping chats started playing. I was his supporter... now I’m CURSED!!
